mapper.select: SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID , EMAIL , PASSWORD , ROLE FROM TB_MEMBER INNER JOIN TB_LOCAL ON TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = TB_LOCAL.MEMBER_ID WHERE TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENRE = #{genre, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MBTI = #{mbti, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
